links.title: Github CLI 1.0
links.description: Github released the first stable version of its command line tools with a ton of features for all sort of actions on Github repositories.

links.title: Vue.js 3.0
links.description: The next major version of Vue.js was released earlier this month. Evan You shares details about it in this YouTube video.

links.title: Cloudflare x Internet Archive
links.description: Cloudflare is now populating and using the Internet Archiveâ€™s Wayback Machine in its content distribution network application

links.title: You Really Don't Need All That JavaScript, I Promise
links.description: Stuart Langridge talks about all that Javascript that piles up in the browser and gives reasonable alternatives to using JS.

links.title: 83 box-shadow Examples
links.description: In this big list CSS Scan collects 83 examples for beautiful, weird or smart box shadows you can use right in your next project.

links.title: The Wikipedia is getting a new look
links.description: A long time after the mobile version of the Wikipedia got a fresh design, the desktop version of it now finally gets its new look.

links.title: Wave Share
links.description: You can transfer files across devices using sound now. Yeah, really. Take a look.

links.title: Deleting 900 million records in MySQL
links.description: The team of Flare show how to delete 900 million records in MySQL without shooting yourself in the foot
